body:
It looks like PPC GNU/Linux used to use socketcall and was changed to use direct socket system calls in http://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/commit/?id=86250b9d12caa1a3dee12a7cf638b7dd70eaadb6 .  That was in 2010; I don't know which Linux kernel version it first appeared in.  The OP says Linux kernel version 2.6.32, though, and that was released December, 2009.

Have we documented a minimum Linux kernel version for PPC support?  If we did document it, where would that be?
